name: 柯明村
objective:
內容包括熱力學第二定律、熵產生率、各種動力循環以及冷凍循環。
The second law of thermodynamics, Entropy generation, power cycles, refrigeration cycles and heat pump cycles.
schedule:
1.Introduction to Thermodynamics
    (1)Basic Concepts
    (2)Energy, State and Equilibrium
    (3)Properties of Pure Substances
2.The Ideal Gases
    (1)Equation of State
    (2)Processes and Real Gases
3.The First Law of Thermodynamics
    (1)Closed Systems
    (2)Control Volumes
    (3)Steady and Unsteady Processes
4.The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Carnot Cycle and Entropy
    (1)Overview of the Second Law
    (2)Refrigerators and Heat Pumps
    (3)Carnot Cycle
5.Refrigeration and Air Conditioning Systems
    (1)Refrigeration Cycles
    (2)Gas-Vapor Mixtures
    (3)Air-Conditioning
scorePolicy:
平時成績：點名未到一次扣 5 分
Mid-Term Exam. ---  40%
Final Exam. ---      40%
Quiz -------------  20%
materials:
Text Book: Y. A. Cengel and M. A. Boles, 
        Thermodynamics-An Engineering Approach, McGraw Hill (台北)
References: R. E. Sonntag, C. Borgnakke and G. J. Van Wylen 
        Fundamentals of Thermodynamics, John Wiley & Sons. (歐亞)
consultation: 研究室分機號碼：3509 研究室位置：綜合科館 515-1 室 Office hours: 週四 15:30 ~ 16:30、週五 14:30 ~ 18:00
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）SDG13：氣候行動（Climate Action）
課程是否導入AI: ● 簡單介紹 AI 的基本概念（Briefly introduce the basic concept of AI）
remarks: 如學校因應疫情而實施遠距離教學，本課程將全採遠距授課，並將使用 teams 來進行遠距授課。
